IX.iii.1.D.1.a
.
How IVAP Is Determined on Calendar-Year Basis
Income for Department of Veterans Affairs purposes (IVAP) for Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) is calculated on a calendar-year basis.  IVAP is based on income received and expenses paid during the period January 1 through December 31 of the same year.
Note
:  This is true regardless of when the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) receives the claim.  There is no “initial year” for Parents’ DIC as there is for pension.
Example
:  If a Parents’ DIC claim is received in June 2006, VA first considers IVAP for all of calendar-year 2006.
